      Methods in Embeddings with parameters of type Graph 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static Jama.Matrix SpectralEmbedding.adjacencyMatrix(Graph G)
      Computes the adjacency matrix of the graph G.
      private static int LayeredEmbedding.crossings(Node n1, Node n2, Graph G, java.util.ArrayList<Node> upper)
      Computes the number of crossings of edges starting somewhere in the layer "upper" and reaching n1 with edges starting in upper and reaching n2.
      static void LayeredEmbedding.defineLayout(Graph G)
      Aligns the nodes of a graph G on horizontal layers in the unit square such that (almost) all edges of G show downwards.
      static void GridEmbedding.defineLayout(Graph G)
      Aligns the nodes of a Graph on a regular grid within the unit square.
      static void LinearEmbedding.defineLayout(Graph G)
      Aligns the nodes of a graph G on a horizontal line in the unit square.
      static void CircularEmbedding.defineLayout(Graph G)
      Aligns the nodes of a graph G on a circle in the unit square according to a circular embedding.
      static void RandomEmbedding.defineLayout(Graph G)
      Aligns the nodes of a graph G randomly in the unit square.
      static void GridEmbedding.defineLayout(Graph G, int nodesPerRow)
      Aligns the nodes of a Graph on a regular grid within the unit square.
      static void SpectralEmbedding.defineLayout(Graph G, int dim)
      Aligns the nodes of a graph G according to a spectral embedding.
      static void SpringEmbedding.defineLayout(Graph G, int dimension, int layoutType)
      Aligns the nodes of a Graph G either within in the unit square, or within the unit cube.
      private static void SpectralEmbedding.defineLayout2D(Graph G)
      Aligns the nodes of a graph G according to a spectral embedding in 2 dimensions (in the unit square).
      private static void SpringEmbedding.defineLayout2D(Graph G)
      Aligns the nodes of a Graph G either within in the unit square, according to a force-based layout algorithm.
      private static void SpectralEmbedding.defineLayout3D(Graph G)
      Aligns the nodes of a graph G according to a spectral embedding in 3 dimensions (in the unit cube).
      private static void SpringEmbedding.defineLayout3D(Graph G)
      Aligns the nodes of a Graph G either within in the unit cube, according to a force-based layout algorithm.
      private static Jama.Matrix SpectralEmbedding.degreeMatrix(Graph G)
      Computes the degree matrix of the Graph G.
      private static boolean SpringEmbedding.iterateOnce(Graph G, int dimension)
      Iterates once over all nodes and for each node the sum of all forces acting on it is calculated.
      private static void LayeredEmbedding.reduceCrossings(Graph G, java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Node>> layers)
      Tries to reduce the crossings in the layers given by the set "layers".

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Node3D.project3DPoints(Graph G)
      Projects the 3D point onto a 2D plane determined by the two vectors X and Y (which are always normal to each other) and the origin of the coordinate system.
      static void Node3D.rotate(java.lang.String c, Graph G)
      Rotates the 2D plane specified by the two vectors X and Y (which are always normal to each other) and the origin of the coordinate system.
      static void Node3D.scale(Graph G)
      Positions on the 2D plane are scaled such that all 2D coordinates of the nodes lie within the unit square.
